          <title>
            <string language="en">A copper kettle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein kupferner Kessel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une bouilloire de cuivre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma chaleira de cobre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una caldaia di rame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια κατσαρόλα χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una caldera de cobre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a copper kettle that is used to boil water. A kettle made of sodium or magnesium is not possible.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kettle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactivity</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen kupfernen Kessel, der
benutzt wird, um Wasser zu kochen. Ein Kessel, der vom Natrium 
oder vom Magnesium gebildet wird, ist nicht möglich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une bouilloire de 
cuivre qui est employée pour bouillir l'eau. Une bouilloire 
faite de sodium ou magnésium n'est pas possible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma chaleira de cobre 
que seja usada ferver a água. Uma chaleira feita do sodium ou 
do magnésio não é possível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una caldaia di rame 
che è usata per bollire l'acqua. Una caldaia fatta di sodio o 
di magnesio non è possibile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κατσαρόλα χαλκού που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να βράσει το ύδωρ. Μια κατσαρόλα 
φιαγμένη από νάτριο ή μαγνήσιο δεν είναι δυνατή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una caldera de cobre que
se utilice para hervir el agua. Una caldera hecha del sodio o 
del magnesio no es posible.</string>
          </description>
